name: Radiant Evil
description:
This game was created for the 2019 Christian Developer Network  speedgame game jam.   It was created in two weeks. 

This is a 1st person puzzle based game. You start out in total darkness. It is Sheol of the old testament. You have died and gone to your grave. You have a final choice to make, to follow the radiant light (God) and end up in Heaven, or you can follow evil (Devil) and go to Hell. You win if you reach Heaven. You loose if you reach Hell. The game has 5 levels. A sign in each level reveals a bible scripture that gives you general clues how to complete the puzzle. Hint: light plays an important part in winning the game.
